Aborts the game.

Indicates whether the a new game is about to be started.

Adds a randomly sized asteroid at least 50 pixels removed from the player.

This method allows one to add a ship to an otherwise useless object.

ap - Variable in class aoop.asteroids.gui.AsteroidsFrame
The panel in which the game is painted.
Asteroid - Class in aoop.asteroids.model
An asteroid is a game object that needs to be destroyed in order to increase the score of the player.
Asteroid(Point, double, double, int) - Constructor for class aoop.asteroids.model.Asteroid
Constructs a new asteroid at the specified location, with specified velocities in both X and Y direction and the specified radius.
Asteroids - Class in aoop.asteroids
Main class of the Asteroids program.

Constructs a new instance of the program.
asteroids - Variable in class aoop.asteroids.model.Game
List of asteroids.
AsteroidsFrame - Class in aoop.asteroids.gui
AsteroidsFrame is a class that extends JFrame and thus provides a game window for the Asteroids game.
AsteroidsFrame(Game, Player) - Constructor for class aoop.asteroids.gui.AsteroidsFrame
Constructs a new Frame, requires a game model.
asteroidsLimit - Variable in class aoop.asteroids.model.Game
Asteroid limit.
AsteroidsPanel - Class in aoop.asteroids.gui
AsteroidsPanel extends JPanel and thus provides the actual graphical representation of the game model.
AsteroidsPanel(Game) - Constructor for class aoop.asteroids.gui.AsteroidsPanel
Constructs a new game panel, based on the given model.
